A

AboutProgram() - Method in class API.Information
This method displays the information about the build It must generally contain the following details:
- Program name - Version - Kernel Version [optional: with name in brackets] - Channel - Build date
AddUser - Class in API.Anima
An API for the program to add a user into the database
AddUser() - Constructor for class API.Anima.AddUser
This constructor has little use in this program.
AddUserScript() - Method in class API.Anima.AddUser
This script will run to create a user by asking details
AddUserScript(String, String, String) - Method in class API.Anima.AddUser
This script will run to create Administrator user during setup
API - package API
Contains all the APIs and supportive functionalities to the core programs.
API.Anima - package API.Anima
Contains the dependencies to manage the user database present.
API.Download - package API.Download
Contains the dependencies which are used to download, encrypt, decrypt the files when requested by the user.
API.Editor - package API.Editor
Contains a set of programs to provide a text editor and a text reader.
API.Update - package API.Update
Contains programs which downloads and installs latest version of the release builds.

B

Boot - Class in Core
Program for users to access the boot menu and provide a login interface.
Boot(boolean) - Constructor for class Core.Boot
This constructor is used to intialize the SecureBoot Variable.
BootRoutine() - Method in class Core.Boot
A routine which is publicly accessible for the programs to run the Boot program from.

C

ClearScreen() - Method in class API.Information
This method clears the screen.
Core - package Core
Contains all the core programs that provide core functionalities.
CreateDB - Class in API.Anima
An API for the program to Initialize a user database
CreateDB() - Constructor for class API.Anima.CreateDB
This constructor has little use in this program.
CreateDB() - Method in class API.Anima.CreateDB
This method will run the actual steps to create the database The database will be created and then be initialized.

L

Launcher - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Launcher() - Constructor for class Launcher
 
Log(String, String) - Method in class API.LogService
Creates a log file of given points in the program either as an [ERROR], [ATTENTION], [WARNING], [CONDITION TRIGGER], [NOTICE] This allows the developers to add the logging service to certain experimental modules which are prone to have potential errors.
The debugging information never contains any user identifiable information.
LoginAPI - Class in API.Anima
An API for the program to validate and login a given user.
LoginAPI(boolean, String, String, String) - Constructor for class API.Anima.LoginAPI
Used to initialize the conditions for the login verification.
LogService - Class in API
Create a log file which contains useful for debugging.
LogService() - Constructor for class API.LogService
This constructor has little use in this program.
